Description: Limestone ostracon: on both sides in black, drawings of pieces of furniture with name-markers and/or numbers.
Curator's comments: For similar representations of furniture with name-markers and/or numbers cf. O.Turin N. 57140, 57141 and 57523, O. Munich 398r. and O. Stockholm MM 14129. Bibliography: S. Birch, 'Inscriptions in the Hieratic and Demotic Character, from the Collections of the British Museum' (London, 1868), pl. VI; E. Brunner-Traut, 'Die altägyptischen Scherbenbilder', (Wiesbaden 1956), p.124 (mentioned only).
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136363) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136363)
